fields.description:
Want to Become a Master Validator? Check out the Lean Startup Machine and their Validation Board. An Awesome way to keep track of all your assumptions and challenges.

What Do I do If My Tests Failed?

If your tests failed, don’t stress! You are still at the beginning of your journey. Some of the best entrepreneurs have failed. Failure just gives you a chance to get it right next time.

fields.title: What Do I do If My Tests Failed?
fields.description:
If your tests failed, don’t stress! You are still at the beginning of your journey. Some of the best entrepreneurs have failed. Failure just gives you a chance to get it right next time.

An organization with great research https://failforward.org/

Lessons You Can learn
